trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipient class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CmsRecipient definierar mottagaren av meddelandet CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipient constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn CmsRecipient skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av det angivna mottagaren certifikatet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referens skickades till en metod som inte accepterar som ett giltigt argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Det gick inte att slutföra en krypteringsåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipient constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn CmsRecipient skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av angivna mottagaren identifieraren typ och mottagaren certifikatet.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> uppräkning som anger vilken typ av identifierare för mottagaren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referens skickades till en metod som inte accepterar som ett giltigt argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Det gick inte att slutföra en krypteringsåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The Certificate property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen certifikat hämtar certifikatet som hör till mottagaren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som innehåller det certifikat som är kopplade till mottagaren.

trans-unit.source: The RecipientIdentifierType property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RecipientIdentifierType hämtar typ av identifierare för mottagaren.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> uppräkning som anger vilken typ av identifierare för mottagaren.
